thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Clara Plank
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Clara Plank

author: Clara Plank
title: Clara Plank
text: We had tannin's in our water, and tubs, toilets, and sinks were so orange. We installed the unit Friday and ran first the cycle that night. After cleaning the tub Saturday morning and filling with water it was like a miracle, we could see right through the water. It was clear! What I am really enjoying though,is not getting spots on the laundry from the tannin's.
